entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to use Libraries.sln in VS #69584
  • [Analyzer]: Unexpected allocation when converting arrays to spans #69577
    7.0.0
  • Vector128.IsHardwareAccelerated always returns false in debugger #69576
  • [API Proposal]: InitialCapacity for AsnWriter #69573
  • [wasm-ep] Can't have both runtime and EventSource event providers in the same session #69568
    7.0.0
  • [System.Data.Odbc] GetSchemaTable fails with [42000 Interrupted] for x64 ODBC driver #69558
  • Exception when I call SslStream.AuthenticateAsClientAsync on net-6 android #69557
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Introduce cancellation sequence numbers to deal with token hiding in linked CTS #69556
  • Cannot easily generate bash RunTests scripts from Windows, and vice versa #69555
  • Arm64: Widespread regressions in multiple benchmarks #69563
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #69561
  • Arm64: Regressions in System.Tests.Perf_Random #69559
  • [Documentation] Add an example to `Utf8JsonReader.Skip` #69552
  • Assertion failed 'preciseVarTypeMap[type] != TYP_UNDEF' when dumping all functions #69551
  • format.py fails on Arm64 due to missing clang-format/cling-tidy binaries upstream. #69550
  • Private key file not got deleted for X509Certificate2 after process exit correctly for .net core program #69549
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: TarReader should not assume same format for all entries in a tar file #69544
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix class returned on evaluation of expression with "?" #69543
  • Source generated interop should be unconditionally ExactSpelling=true #69541
    7.0.0
  • ILLinker NRE on windows/x86 #69536
  • Audit source-generated marshallers for integer overflow bugs #69532
    7.0.0
  • Enable Int128/UInt128 interop tests for Mono #69531
  • Source generated marshalling can leak unmanaged resources in the presence of exceptions #69529
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Enable running analyzers on `System.Text.RegularExpressions.Generator` project #69523
  • DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ConvertToGeneratedDllImportAnalyzerTests.TypeRequiresMarshalling_ReportsDiagnostic #60909
    7.0.0
  • Test failure DllImportGenerator.UnitTests.ManualTypeMarshallingAnalyzerTests.NativeTypeWithGetPinnableReferenceNoValueProperty_ReportsDiagnostic #62223
    7.0.0
  • failure in LibraryImportGenerator.UnitTests.ManualTypeMarshallingAnalyzerTests.UninstantiatedGenericNativeTypeOnGenericWithArityMatch_DoesNotReportDiagnostic #66668
    7.0.0
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException occurs while displaying base64string in WinForms application #61997
    7.0.0
  • Add support for Android Bionic runtime #66027
    7.0.0
  • Typo in Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyModel/src/DependencyContextStrings.cs #69562
    7.0.0
  • [ SignalR ] TypeScript EventSource dependency security vulnerability #69546
  • Crash when running dotnet command with .NET 7 7.0.100-preview.5.22267.11-win-arm64 #69513
  • Add support for Int128 and UInt128 data types #67151
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Expose xarch serialize instruction. #66467
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Vector128.LoadUnsafe<TFrom,TTo> #66901
  • Runtime metric for synchronous waits #63016
  • Add AppContext switch to set default MaxConnectionsPerServer #59809
    7.0.0
  • Each parameter in the deserialization constructor on type 'SpeechCreatedEvent' must bind to an object property or field on deserialization. Each parameter name must match with a property or field on the object. The match can be case-insensitive.' #69547
  • Microsof.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions version 6+ is not verifiable #69395
  • Many test timeouts -- external server outage #57134
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • ZipFile UnixCreateSetsPermissionsInExternalAttributes test fails on Apple OSes #69583
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Refactoring which numeric interface exposes which methods to match latest API review decisions #69582
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable analyzers for System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration #69581
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Add CopyString and ValueIsEscaped APIs to Utf8JsonReader #69580
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable analyzers for Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators #69579
    area-Extensions-Logging
  • Updating Vector*.IsHardwareAccelerated to be recursive #69578
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add IL Emit support for MethodInfo.Invoke() and friends #69575
    area-System.Reflection, 7.0.0
  • `JsonIgnoreCondition` controls are extended #69574
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Added `--git_diff` option SPMI asm diffs #69572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CI fix for native aot tests #69571
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm-ep] Implement EventSource counters support; add an EventPipeSessionOptions builder to TS #69567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono
  • [Android] Fix app crash when using non-native HttpClientHandler #69565
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Fix handling process affinity mask on Windows 11 #69548
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Added support for getting members of static structures. #69542
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • make sure socket is intialized before connecting TCPClient #69540
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • avoid pulling Ssl internals to other assemblies #69539
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Change location where we output message about notification profilers being disabled #69538
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix typos #69537
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Derivative updates #69530
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Iterative generic math changes to match API review #69391
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Enable analyzers for regex generator project #69564
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix dependencymodel typo #69566
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][eventpipe] Implementing MethodDetails and BulkType events #68571
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Allocate less with X500DistinguishedName #69514
    area-System.Security, breaking-change
  • Update libraries build instructions on Unix #69553
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix failure in host test for interleaved output on unhandled exception #69528
    test-bug, area-Host
  • Run host tests with dotnet test and enable crash/hang dumps #69340
    area-Host
  • Make superpmi.py collect easier to use #69487
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AppContext data support for DefaultMaxConnectionsPerServer #68952
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Clean up code for CPU_Group_Info structs #69533
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Adding Int128 and UInt128 with a base software implementation #69204
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use span instead of array on PublicKey #69534
    area-System.Security
  • Do not automatically mark Stephen Toub as the issue triager or PR champion #69452
    area-Meta
  • [wasm-ep] Minimal diagnostic tracing configuration and sample #69158
    arch-wasm, area-System.Diagnostics-mono

Updated

  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #69041
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Keep native order of get members call from Type #69506
    area-System.Reflection
  • GetTotalPauseDuration implementation #68835
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Fixes #64159 - JsonSerializerContext source generation fails with keyword identifiers #66876
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, source-generator
  • Use SubtleCrypto API on browser DOM scenarios #65966
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] improve memory access and marshaling range checks #64845
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] CI build improvements #69519
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, area-Debugger-mono
  • [Perf][Mono] Add new Mono Mobile Scenarios to Performance Runs #69526
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [draft] [wasm] JS Marshaler based on code-gen and [JSImport] and [JSExport] attributes #66304
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [RyuJIT] Emit shlx, sarx, shrx on x64 #67182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink loop with stackalloc #69335
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Draft for Min/Max intrinsics xarch #69434
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hoist the invariants out of multi-level nested loops #68061
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use IntegralRange in fgOptimizeRelationalComparisonWithCasts #69247
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upstream coreclr and pal changes to support powerpc (ppc64le) architecture #69105
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • Use span to pass type modifiers in RuntimeTypeHandle.GetTypeHelper #69425
    community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add Fedora 37 RID #65392
    NO-MERGE, area-Host, community-contribution
  • WIP: Cross module work #68919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Always morph GT_MOD for ARM64 #68885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement vpblendvb optimization in the JIT #69509
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • [Mono] Enable Equals to handle NaN value #69499
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Merge several version of MsQuicStream SendAsync code #68772
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [API Implementation]: Expose `StopTheHostException` #69404
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix some scaling issues with the global queue in the thread pool #69386
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Fixing wrong stack size calculation in the mono interpreter for back edges #68855
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add `BStrStringMarshaller` to source generator #69213
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Add coop GC transitions to various EMSCRIPTEN_KEEPALIVE functions; define to noop if no threads #69515
    arch-wasm, area-Threading-mono
  • [API Implementation]: Extend System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86 to support nint and nuint #63594
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Enable LLVM on device runs #69504
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP: [Mono] Fix 4244 warnings. #69236
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Add support for delegate GDV and method-based vtable GDV #68703
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • JIT: Move constant vectors to op2 from op1 #67502
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Deleting field sequences from `LCL_FLD` and `VNF_PtrToArrElem` #68986
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add NativeMemory.ZeroMemory API #69500
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Resumbmit tar feedback changes, include Android build fix #69469
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Make superpmi.py collect work on crashes/assertion failures #69494
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] JIT: Abandon loop search if we reach the end of the bbNext chain #69525
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Enabled null-conditional operator on EvaluateOnFrame #69307
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Use correct AOT annotation on JsonSerializerOptions.GetConverterFromAttribute #69520
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Use csel and ccmp for conditional moves #67894
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Switch checked coreclr + libraries tests configs around in PRs #69180
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add support for symbolicating traces via XHarness #66226
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • avoid allocation of SafeFreeSslCredentials and SafeDeleteSslContext on Linux #69527
    area-System.Net.Security, os-linux
  • Try enabling regions for native AOT. #69108
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add EvaluationResult Scheme for arrays. #67095
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Add SubstitutionParser that uses XPath Navigator into NativeAOT #64671
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix ProcessorCount calculation on Windows 11 #68639
    area-System.Threading
  • File system type fix #69484
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Permit SET OF to be incorrectly sorted in GetNameInfo #69498
    area-System.Security
  • pool async state in SslStream #69418
    area-System.Net.Security

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hang in <Exec "dotnet build" #25543
  • dotnet build -disable-build-servers is not working #25536
  • dotnet-watch support running on ACNM #25523
  • CLI in watch mode to wait for process exit before launching new one #25516

PullRequests

Created

  • add rule to make sure enum values match #25542
    Area-Compatibility
  • Remove dotnet-format option parsing and have them pass-through. #25541
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [dotnet-watch] Updates the request path to always be host relative #25534
    Area-AspNetCore
  • [dotnet-watch] Fixes an infinite loop of reloads when the process fails to start #25533
  • Update the RID target from lower win to the latest one #25526
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25522
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Support suppressing transitive framework reference downloads, and other changes #25358
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #25403
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • [ASP.NET] Fix pack for static web assets in cross-targeting scenarios #25011
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Implement functionality for templating workload and version constraints #25505
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace hardcoded error string in source with string from resources #25372
    localization, area-Meta
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1779727 #25346
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Proposal: ref interface to avoid boxing #1111

Updated

  • Proposal: Semi-Auto-Properties; `field` keyword #140
    Working Set

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Sync namespaces for .NET Framework #61421
    Backlog
  • Show warning if function return value is not used #61420
  • Name simplification is missing on System.IntPtr #61419
    C# 11.0
  • Remaining work to get 'Background Wait Indicator' sufficient for most of Roslyn, and ready for Platform adoption. #61416
  • EnC: editing around try-catch block in top-level local function does not work #61415
  • Go To Definition doesn't go to Object Browser. #61411

Closed

  • Don't restrict Peek Definition to showing only method signatures #61401
  • roslyn.visualstudio.integrationtests.csharp.csharpextractmethod.extractmethodwithtriviaselected is flaky #61407
  • IDE0059: Variables are used and not handled correctly #61404
  • Multi const string concat using interpolation - not optimized #61405
  • Accepting completion list time 'parameter' does not include the ':' from the presented text in the completion item #61412
  • Formatting option AllowDisjointSpanMerging has no storage and is never set to non-default value #58823
    17.3
  • Make OptionKey serializable so that integration tests can pass it between processes #59267
  • Consider grouping some fields of SyntaxFormattingOptions into a struct #59090
    17.3
  • Separate global options and solution options #55728
    Backlog
  • Add ability to specify whether options of IOptionsProvider should be part of solution snapshot #42308
    Backlog
  • source link should show file info #61398
  • Incorrect name ambiguity with discard lambda parameters #61143
    17.3
  • Consider gracefully recovering from erroneous use of 'unchecked' in operator declaration #60394
    17.3
  • Semantic Classifier failure with var patterns #30855
    Compiler.Next
  • Braces need escaping in raw string interpolation on net472 #61355

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge IBC data for .Net core binaries #61424
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid logging work when no logger is specified #61423
    Area-IDE
  • Update SDK to .NET 7 Preview 4 #61422
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Address feedback from numeric IntPtr feature review #61418
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Small cleanup for pull diagnostics logging #61417
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Use RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan for array initialization with relevant primitives #61414
    Area-Compilers
  • Update ServiceHub package version #61410
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove unnecessary finalizer state handling from MethodToStateMachine… #61409
    Area-Compilers
  • Organize contributing notes and add WSL testing section #61408
    Area-Compilers
  • Solution options #61406
    Area-IDE
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • More instrumentation for ReferenceCachingCS #61402
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Remove parameter nullchecking feature #61397
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Disable sln crawler diagnostics when LSP pull is enabled #61396
    Area-IDE
  • [LSP] Use reflection for semantic token types + expose types to Razor #61395
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Emit CompilerFeaturesRequiredAttribute #61388
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Wait for async operations to complete before proceeding #61413
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix function id in Resolve Conflicts #61400
    Area-IDE, Next
  • [LSP] More correctly respect background analysis scope #61392
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Allow skeletons to be reused in frozen-partial scenarios (for inheritance margin) #61286
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix typo #61380
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Use AspNetCoreKey in external access assembly #61399
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Add new collapsing option for metadata files that contain source #61205
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Add lambda parameters in scope in nameof using proper binder #61382
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Parse `unchecked` gracefully in operators #61309
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators, Next
  • Verify classification on var pattern #61376
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Verifying interpolation escaping of curlies in content #61387
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61394
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • WIP: Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • ✨ Implement ImmutableSegmentedHashSet<T> #54719
    Area-Compilers
  • Add FixAll support for UseExpressionBody/BlockBody refactoring #61240
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • EditorFeatures.Cocoa: Bump macos workload to RC3 #61250
    Area-IDE
  • Update 'Rename's commit behavior to be async. #61381
    Area-IDE
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers
  • Reduce allocations in DirectMemoryAccessStreamReader.ReadToEnd #61351
    Area-IDE, Community
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add opened and closed event handling for non-source documents #61377
    Area-IDE
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can't debug C native dependency of WASM Blazor #41764
  • Default dev certificate not working with Http3 #41762
  • Allow specifying authentication schemes where anti-forgery checks are (not) required #41759
  • Remove Task.Run from DefaultHealthCheckService checking services #41758
  • Integer Overflow Causing HTTP1 Connections to Fail in Kestrel #41756
  • ForEach Re Render #41754
  • css isolation compiler warnings for incorrect css syntax #41751
  • Blazor NullReferenceException at AuthorizeViewCore.OnParametersSetAsync() in Published App but runs fine locally #41748
  • Bundling JS modules #41746

Closed

  • [Feature Request] Make `asp-for` compatible with the Constraint Validation API #41750
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis never connect error #41749
  • Expose IServer.Features to DI #40043
    7.0-preview5
  • ANCM PostStartCheck Failure #41409

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix client results with Hub<T> IHubContext #41763
    area-signalr
  • Add test for assembly versions in our packages #41761
  • [release/6.0] Backport branch mirror pipeline #41760
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Fix Integer Overflow in Header Processing #41757
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add support for logging additional request headers #41753
    area-runtime, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove unused code from ANCM setup and enable more MSVC warnings for SDL #41747
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Make RedirectRule honor specified scheme #41745
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5
  • Allow explicit manual runs of mirror pipeline #41736
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Update duende versions to 6.0.4 #41370
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Update Trimming.md #41720
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview5
  • Add IServerDelegationFeature to DI #41737
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview5

Updated

  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Try deleting installer dir #41693
    area-infrastructure
  • Enable trim analyzer #41683
    area-infrastructure
  • Add trimming annotations to DotNetObjectReference #41610
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-jsinterop
  • Initialize Activity with parent ID #41568
    area-runtime
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Request Decompression middleware #40279
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Dotnet-trace in container does not collect full stack information #3051
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Dev/mirogers/kudu console #3083
    dotnet-trace, dotnet-counters, dotnet-dump, dotnet-stack

Updated

  • [Proposal] Add dotnet-trace report stat and report script command #2988
    enhancement, dotnet-trace
  • Update SOS to show thread pool work items from new queues #3080
    7.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Shell.OnNavigating and Shell.OnNavigated is not consitent #7351
  • SkiaSharp based component renders using Shell, does not render using normal navigation #7350
  • RadioButtonGroup - MAUI Crash on Release InvalidCastException #7347
  • [Feature Request] New Navigation Bar to Mimic win ui Behavour In Shell #7345
  • Running the ListViewDemo on win 11 gets Win32 unhandled exception, fatal error #7344
  • CollectionView Crash when clearing & adding data second time. #7343
  • Label rendered differently when using <Span> and FontAttributes="Bold" #7341
  • Control event propagation? #7332
  • ZIndex crashes on Published builds #7331
  • [iOS] MinimumHeightRequest and MinimumWidthRequest are not working properly for View #7330
  • Page is not transient when used as ShellContent #7329
  • [IOS] [MacCatalyst] TooltipItems aren't visible #7328
  • [Windows] CollectionView cut off #7326
  • Crash trying to use TemplatedView #7325
  • IPhone not detected #7323
  • ScrollView layout not updating when child IsVisible is updated #7322
  • Different order of Appearing Event and NavigatedTo Event when using Shell ? #7320
  • Windows app gets a unknown win32 error on exit #7317
  • Button.Shadow Win32 Exception (Win11) #7316
  • iOS - CollectionView inside of RefreshView does not size correctly #7315
  • Stepper on Android #7314
    6.0.300-servicing

Closed

  • The dotnet_bot image in default mobile template is blurry #6121
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] What Happened to the MediaElement? #7318
  • Entry with IsPassword="True" does not work correctly #7334
  • ImageSource.LoadImage callback is never invoked on Windows #6638
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [Bug] Change Android Image Handler to Load into view instead of loading a drawable #2271
    6.0.300
  • Collect list of changed default padding/margin/spacing values #4594
  • Invalidate/PlatformInvalidator - try to remove #3946
  • DisconnectHandler is never called #3604
    6.0.300-servicing
  • FlyoutBackgroundColor not working when FlyoutBehavior is locked. #7321
  • Custom control use Handler show "There is no implicit reference conversion from MyHandler to Microsoft.Maui.IElementHandler" only at Windows #7333
  • ios DateTimeOffset.ToLocalTime() fails to get local timezone to do conversion #7319
  • CurrentCulture on iOS not available at startup #3962
    6.0.300-servicing
  • [iOS] Cannot Debug #6869
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Error DEP0700 #7299
  • #if WINDOWS not working correctly when referencing code in a separate Maui project #6919
    6.0.300-servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix BlazorWebView disposal #7349
  • Don't clear old images. Fixes #6625 #7348
    area/image :framed_picture:, control-image, 6.0.3xx-sr1
  • Merge the PublicAPI checker into main #7339

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test: Combine CompileQuery tests in sync/async variation #28062
  • ReplaceService on AddDbContext doesn't work at design time, but it does in OnConfiguring #28060
  • Temporal rewriter may have issue #28058

Closed

  • Migration name filter #23222
    7.0.0
  • Possible bug with relations loading (foreign key) #28029

PullRequests

Created

  • Add more cast nodes in multi-line breaks during migrations #28064
    auto-merge
  • Query: Use accurate generic types in group join flattening #28063
    auto-merge
  • Query: Add TPCTableSplittingTests #28061
  • Update test for #23303 #28059
    auto-merge

Merged

  • Add Migration name check #26396
    community-contribution

Updated

  • Add AtTimeZoneExpression and some relevant translations #26972
  • Improve SQL Server IndexOf translation and change tests to use Where #28031
